Title: 253: Solving Problems With Data Science & Uber
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with Associate Professor at the University of California San Diego, Bradley Voytek, who was the first data scientist, and the person to kickstart data science at Uber. You will hear a lot about his past work at Uber and his current work at UCSD. You will learn 4 valuable philosophical points about data science being a separate field and you will also learn what data science skills can help you resist automation.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/253
